# INFRA-019: Advanced Governance & Lifecycle

## Status
APPROVED

## Context
Based on the Feature Proposal, this plan focuses on strengthening the governance model and automating the release lifecycle.

## Child Stories
- [INFRA-018: Implement Agent Retrospective](file:////Users/jcook/repo/agentic-dev/.agent/cache/stories/INFRA/INFRA-018-implement-agent-retrospective.md)
- [INFRA-019: Implement Agent Release](file:////Users/jcook/repo/agentic-dev/.agent/cache/stories/INFRA/INFRA-019-implement-agent-release.md)
- [INFRA-020: Implement Agent Audit](file:////Users/jcook/repo/agentic-dev/.agent/cache/stories/INFRA/INFRA-020-implement-agent-audit.md)

## Summary
The goal is to enforce "Governance as Code" more strictly and learn from past development cycles.

## Objectives
- **Retrospective**: Analyze completed stories to generate friction reports.
- **Release Automation**: Automate version bumping and changelog generation.
- **Audit**: Deep-dive compliance checks for code traceability.

## Verification
- **Code Review**: Pass preflight.
- **Manual Testing**: Generate reports and dry-run releases.
